langChange: I'll be speakin' English from now on, arr!
invalidLang: That language be not existin', ye scallywag!
noMoney: Ye don't have enough **{coinName}** fer that, ye penniless deckhand!
dailyAlreadyClaimed: Avast, **{memberName}**! Ye've already claimed yer daily plunder!
dailyClaimed: **{memberName}**, ye've been awarded {coinSymbol}**{extra1}** **{coinName}**! Don't fergit to return fer more booty tomorrow, arr!
gaveMoneyMultiple: **{memberName}** shared {coinSymbol}**{extra1}** **{coinName}** among **{extra2}**. Fair winds to ye all!
invalidAmount: That be no proper amount, ye bilge rat!
noSpecifiedAmount: Ye didn't say how much, ye daft landlubber!
belowOrEqualToZero: The amount can't be zero or less, ye scurvy dog!
gambleWon: Ye won! The luck o' the sea be with ye!
gambleLose: Ye lost... Best stick to swabbin' the deck.
newGambleBalance: Ye now have {coinSymbol}**{extra1}** **{coinName}** in yer coffers.
noCoinNameSpecified: Ye need to name yer coin, matey!
newCoinNameSuccess: The coin o' this here ship be now called: **{extra1}**
noCoinSymbolSpecified: Ye need to pick a symbol fer yer coin, arr!
newCoinSymbolSuccess: The coin symbol o' this vessel be now: **{extra1}**
firstDailyValueInvalid: The first value must be a whole number, ye numbskull!
secondDailyValueInvalid: The second value must be a whole number, ye barnacle!
dailyValuesBelowZero: None o' them values can be zero or less, ye scallywag!
firstDailyValueBigger: The first value can't be bigger than the second, ye blunderbuss!
secondDailyValueSmaller: The second value can't be smaller than the first, ye addle-pate!
newDailyRangeSuccess: Daily plunder now be between **{extra1}** and **{extra2}**.
roleAdded: The '**{extra1}**' role be added to the role shop fer {coinSymbol}**{extra2} {coinName}**.
roleRemoved: The '**{extra1}**' role be walkin' the plank from the role shop!
invalidIndex: That be no proper index, ye lubber!
alreadyHasRole: Ye already have that role, ye greedy sea dog!
invalidPage: That page don't exist, ye blind bat!
unknownKeyword: That keyword be unknown, ye blunderin' fool!
noUserSpecified: Ye didn't name a soul, ye forgetful codfish!
noAdminPrivileges: Ye lack the power to do that, ye measly powder monkey!
NSFWOnlyCommand: This command be fer the tavern only, ye saucy wench!
notPossible: Ye can't do that, ye bilge-suckin' barnacle!
walletCommand: Check yer own or another's treasure stash.
giveCommand: Give someone some **{coinName}**. If ye name many, the loot be split among 'em.
rankCommand: See who be the wealthiest scallywags aboard.
shopBuyCommand: Buy yerself a fancy role from the shop.
doubleCommand: If luck be with ye, ye might double yer gamble!
coinflipCommand: Let fate decide with a trusty coin toss.
rollCommand: Roll the bones. Ye can pick how many dice and sides.
e621Command: Search fer posts on e621, arr!
coinNameCommand: Change the name o' the ship's coin.
coinSymbolCommand: Change the symbol o' the ship's coin.
dailyRangeCommand: Change how much daily booty be handed out.
setLangCommand: Change **CuernitosBot**'s tongue. If ye say nothin', it'll show ye what tongues be known.
addShopRoleCommand: Add a role to the shop.
removeShopRoleCommand: Remove a role from the shop.
ruShootHelp: Try to shoot someone. If the pistol don't fire, ye must turn it on yerself.
ruShootmeHelp: Point the pistol at yer own head.
ruBetHelp: Place a wager o' **{coinName}**. The winner takes all at the end.
ruWinsHelp: See how many victories ye or another scallywag have.
name: name
e621ResultsAmountFound: I found {extra1} treasures with these tags.
ruLeave: **{memberName}** has fled Pirate's Roulette. Yellow-bellied coward!
ruAlreadyStarted: A game be already underway, ye impatient cur!
ruNoGame: No game be happenin' right now.
ruNotInGame: **{memberName}**, ye be not in the game!
ruNotEnoughPlayers: Not enough scallywags to start the game!
ruYourTurn: It be **{extra1}**'s turn to face the pistol!
ruCantBet: Ye can't place a wager while the game be on, ye fool!
ruBetPlaced: **{memberName}** has wagered {coinSymbol}**{extra1}** **{coinName}**! Now the winner takes all: {coinSymbol}**{extra2}** **{coinName}**!
ruNotYourTurn: It be not yer turn yet, **{extra1}**!
ruShootFail: **{extra1}** tried to shoot **{extra2}**, but the pistol jammed!
ruShootYourselfSuccess: **{extra1}** pulled the trigger on their noggin, but the pistol clicked empty!
ruGameOver: The game be over! **{extra1}** has won! (**{extra2}** victories.)
ruNoAction: Ye didn't say what to do, ye addled pirate!
invalidDice: Them dice be cursed! Try again.
